field.name: summary
field.value: Documentation in configuration for PostgreSQL is wrong

field.name: description
field.value:
Hello guys,
There is a problem in the configuration in the webpage.
It states that it should be:
<add key="connection.connection_string" value="server=localhost;port=5432;initial catalog=mydb;user id=postgres;Password=pass;" />
But it should be:
<add key="connection.connection_string" value="server=localhost;port=5432;DATABASE=citizen;user id=postgres;Password=pass;" />

comment.author: George.Silva
comment.text: Oh, I'm sorry. The problem is in PostgreSQL configuration.
